jobs.title: Support Specialist
jobs.description:
Want a job that combines the excitement of working in a high-growth tech startup with the fulfilment of creating life-changing social impact? Then this is the role for you!

As a Support Specialist, you're collaborating with the amazing people referred to Beam, coaching them through their remarkable journey out of homelessness and into rewarding work. 

Youâ€™re a creative problem solver, directly helping us to iterate and bring our award-winning platform to true scale.

Youâ€™re someone who enjoys getting out and about, meeting everyone from people living in homeless hostels to senior government figures.

Youâ€™re ambitious, excited by the prospect of working with super smart teammates in a startup founded by someone thatâ€™s scaled a business to millions of users and raised funding from investors in the likes of Facebook and Dropbox.

You're friendly and empathetic and excel at building strong, respectful working relationships.

Youâ€™re excited by the prospect of getting a little nerdy with the latest apps and working in a data-driven way - even if techâ€™s a new direction for you.

You're process-driven and solution-orientated, able to juggle demanding workloads in a fast-paced startup environment that works to ambitious KPIs.

Working as a Support Specialist is the perfect entry point into Beam during a pivotal time in our growth as a social business. Candidates interested in working within other areas of Beam are encouraged to consider putting in an application and starting their journey with us here. The Mission Support team is at the heart of why we exist: to transform peopleâ€™s lives for the better. 

The position is based in Moorgate, London, although may require occasional co-locating within Greater London. 

RESPONSIBILITIES

Coaching people on career planning before navigating them through training and into sustained employment 
Working face-to-face with people to create content for their crowdfunding campaign using our proprietary in-house technology
Brokering relationships with new training and employment partners to streamline training and employment pathways for people
Collaborating with our brilliant referral partners in the world of charities and local government 
Building a strong, respectful and professional working relationship with people using Beam to skill up
Producing detailed wellbeing plans and case notes
Working to ambitious KPIs that increase our social impact 
Generating ideas and processes that iterate our model of support services towards scale

REQUIREMENTS

>1 year high-quality professional experience in a start-up, social enterprise, highly-regarded company, or the social care or charities sector
Experience working with vulnerable individuals - or huge enthusiasm to excel in that field (don't worry, youâ€™ll be enrolled into a thorough training programme when you join)
Entrepreneurial, get things done attitude
Passion for innovation and social impact
Thrives under pressure and in fast-paced environments
Highly detail-orientated and risk-aware while working with integrity and openness
Highly adaptable, personable and excited to work with people from diverse backgrounds
Committed to promoting equality of opportunity in London - and far beyond

COMPENSATION & PERKS

Â£25-35k - we're open to hearing from a broad range of experiences
Additional EMI-qualifying share options in Beam
Stunning coworking office in Moorgate (complete with mini golf and table tennis)
Work-hard, play-hard culture with an annual mini-break 
Brand new MacBook Air or PC
Â£200 annual learning and personal development budget
'Beam team talks' with some of the UK's leading tech entrepreneurs

We're a rapidly-growing, high-energy team who love our work and making a positive impact. If you believe in our purpose and want to learn fast and drive some major innovation, get in touch.

ðŸ‘‰ Please apply here https://careers.beam.org/jobs/108873-support-specialist

jobs.title: Growth Marketer
jobs.description:
Beam is pioneering an incredibly impactful new model to support disadvantaged to get into skilled work at scale.

Beam was launched in 2017 by an experienced entrepreneur who previously raised investment from the investors of Facebook, Slack and Deliveroo to grow businesses in the sharing economy space.

Supported by some of the UK's leading tech entrepreneurs, Beam has already crowdfunded Â£400,000+ from thousands of campaign supporters, won the endorsement of the Mayor of London and been awarded Europe's Best Tech for Good.

We are now looking for a hands-on and experienced growth marketer to own our supporter acquisition funnel

We have a passionate group of supporters, who have come so far from PR and word of mouth. Weâ€™ve done some initial experiments with Facebook, but have yet to scratch the surface of what could be done and the community that can be grown.

Your initial focus will be on testing different channels and learning what works best - touching everything including paid and organic, digital and offline, quick wins and longshots.


Youâ€™ll define our long-term growth strategy

Our purpose at Beam is to create a society where anyone can achieve their potential. â€‹To do this weâ€™ll need to enable hundreds of thousands and then millions of people to support the homeless people using Beam.

How do we establish a growth strategy to make this happen? Youâ€™ll define how we can drive this forward by developing our growth strategy from the ground up.

Youâ€™ll have experience of growth marketing for fast-growing consumer start-ups. We are looking for someone who is hands-on in trying new ideas out, as comfortable working with data as building landing pages, albeit with no-code solutions.

Youâ€™ll report directly to the founder and CEO.


You should apply if:

What weâ€™re doing here at Beam excites you!
You have a strong track record of multi-channel campaign management and optimisation, including performance marketing across multiple platforms
You think in hypotheses and tests
The only thing you love more than a bold idea is getting it working in real life
You are hungry to accelerate growth â€“ ambitious, driven and proactive
